entry.name: Hosts Visiting Malicious Sites
entry.caption: Hosts Visiting Malicious Sites
entry.query: (category eq command-and-control) or (category eq malware) or (category eq phishing)

entry.name: Hosts Visiting Threat Cats
entry.caption: Hosts Visiting Threat Cats
entry.query: (category eq dynamic-dns) or (category eq parked) or (category eq unknown)

entry.name: Hosts Visiting Risky Sites
entry.caption: Hosts Visiting Risky Sites
entry.query: ((zone.src neq INTERNET) and (zone.dst eq INTERNET) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.1) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.2) and (addr.dst notin 127.0.0.3)) and ((category eq dynamic-dns) or (category eq parked) or (category eq unknown))

entry.name: WildFire Malicious Verdicts
entry.caption: WildFire Malicious Verdicts
entry.query: (verdict eq malicious) or (verdict eq phishing)

entry.name: WildFire verdicts SMTP
entry.caption: WildFire verdicts SMTP
entry.query: (app eq smtp)

entry.name: Used Rules

entry.query: (app neq insufficient-data) and (app neq incomplete) and (app neq not-applicable)

entry.name: Inbound Non-Working-Traffic

entry.name: Inbound Brute Force
entry.caption: Inbound Brute Force
